abstract: German authorities announce death of police officer after 49-year-old supporter of fringe Nazi-influenced group opens fire on police who had visited his home in order to confiscate weapons.

headline.print_headline: Nazi Follower  Shoots Officers  in Germany
headline.main: German Police Officer Dies After Raid on Supporter of Far-Right Fringe Group

snippet: The gunman opened fire when the police came to seize his weapons, after he ignored repeated warnings, officials said....
lead_paragraph: The gunman opened fire when the police came to seize his weapons, after he ignored repeated warnings, officials said.
